title: 9/0 Kat, roaming to every lane
body:
Somehow, every time I recall, everyone on my team dies at once. Now Riven, Luc, and Kha (who I killed at blue four times) are all legendary.
I'm 12/9 now and no one on my team wants to surrender. We only have one of their towers down on each lane and they have all of ours to our inhibs. 

Blind optimism op...
